titleStmt.title: The humble desires and propositions of the Lords and Commons in Parliament tendred to His Majestie, February 1. and His Majesties gracious answer and propositions the third of February 1642.
Proceedings. 1643-02-01
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.

The "genuine Royalist" London edition of: The humble desires and propositions of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled: tendered to His Majesty 1. February, 1642. With His Maiesties gratious answer thereunto. (Wing E1562, Madan 1219).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
